    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AlphaBetaPlayer
    A player applying alpha-beta pruning to the minimax algorithm.
    CachingMinimaxPlayer
    A player that uses caching to improve on the minimax algorithm.
    Game
    The GUI components of the game including grid and buttons.
    GameController
    Controller for Islands of Hex game.
    GameController.ViewDelegate
    The interface for views of the game.
    GameDriver
    Main launching point for the Islands of Hex Game.
    GameModel
    The game board and associated logic.
    GameModelImplementation
    A concrete representation of the state of a game of Islands of Hex.
    Graph<T>
    A graph.
    Graph.Node<T>
    A node within a graph.
    Hexagon
    A single hexagonal tile on the game board.
    HexGrid
    The view component displaying the hexagonal grid.
    MinimaxPlayer
    A player that chooses the highest-scoring move based on the assumption that the opponent will always choose the lowest-scoring move.
    Move
    Constructs a potential move.
    RandomMaxPlayer
    A player that chooses the highest-scoring move based on the assumption that the opponent chooses moves randomly.
    RandomPlayer
    A simulated Islands of Hex player who places tiles randomly.
    RowColPair
    A row-column pair.
    SimulatedGameTreePlayer
    A simulated player that uses a game tree to select moves.
    SimulatedPlayer
    The base class for all simulated players.
    TileColor
    A representation of the colors of board positions and tiles in Islands of Hex.
    TimeLimitedSimulatedPlayer
    A simulated player operating under time constraints.
    TimeLimitedSimulatedPlayer.Listener
    A listener to moves provided by a linked TimeLimitedSimulatedPlayer.
    TournamentPlayer
    A simulated player for a timed tournament.
    TranspositionTable
    A table for storing and retrieving the results of calls to SimulatedGameTreePlayer.getMyMove(GameModel, int, islands.model.TileColor).
